remarks: The polarity of the whole space is the zero subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lpolv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lpolv.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lpolv.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` W ) $.
lpolv.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
lpolv.o $e |- ( ph -> ._|_ e. P ) $.
lpolvN $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` V ) = { .0. } ) $.
